item.title: Lego Volkswagen T1 Trailer
item.description:
I got some pieces that were part of a Lego Volkswagen T1 ðŸ›’#ad but couldn’t make for the complete set (which I already owned), so I was checking what mods I could build based on it, and best one, based on the amount of pieces was this one found on Rebrickable.

As I found it to be a bit sad to leave the wheel, and some other elements outside I did some minor changes:
